layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x568
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (16,0) size 752x76 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 750x74
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 750x24
            LayoutTableCell {TH} at (2,2) size 173x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (45,2) size 83x19
                text run at (45,2) width 83: "Header One"
            LayoutTableCell {TH} at (177,2) size 270x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (93,2) size 84x19
                text run at (93,2) width 84: "Header Two"
            LayoutTableCell {TH} at (449,2) size 299x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=2 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (102,2) size 95x19
                text run at (102,2) width 95: "Header Three"
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,28) size 750x44
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,28) size 173x44 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=1 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 157x39
                text run at (2,2) width 116: "This table uses the"
                text run at (2,22) width 157: "separated borders model."
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (177,28) size 270x44 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=1 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 251x39
                text run at (2,2) width 251: "This means that elements within the cell"
                text run at (2,22) width 180: "have border-spacing of 1em."
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (449,28) size 299x44 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=1 c=2 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 279x39
                text run at (2,2) width 205: "The borders on the header cells, "
                text run at (207,2) width 74: "on all sides,"
                text run at (2,22) width 198: "should be medium solid purple."
